faction.raw_description: Beyond the dark portal lies a realm of fire and darkness. It is thehome of ancient beings born of darkness. Forbidden fromsetting foot in the fair lands of Teleria, these foul entities haveconspired with Necromancers to breed Demonspawn - unholyunions of Demon and mortal
